data.title: Roadhouse Cinemas Tucson
data.meta_description: Roadhouse Cinemas provides an amazing movie and dining experience. Our theaters feature an extraordinary menu, full bar, comfortable recliners and state of the art movie projectors and sound.
data.text:
JOIN US FOR A FILM-INSPIRED CULINARY ADVENTURE!

We want to welcome you to enjoy our special, limited-time screenings with thoughtfully curated food and drink menus inspired by the movie. These special menus will only be available during the event screenings. Come join us!

(regular menu also available upon request.)

ATTENTION PARENTS! A reminder that "Deadpool & Wolverine" is rated R. Per our refund policy, ticket refunds must be processed no later than an hour before showtime (online or in-person). Please plan accordingly. Thank you!

If you had a good experience at RoadHouse Cinemas, please take a brief moment to scan these QR codes to leave a review on Google Reviews or Yelp Reviews! If your experience was not satisfactory, please always ask for a manager. We want you to leave happy!

‚óè OCAP Wednesdays! OCAP is short for Open Captioning. This means the dialogue will be presented on screen as subtitles on all shows from open until 5:00 pm on Wednesdays. This feature aims to make the moviegoing experience more accessible for the deaf and hard-of-hearing communities. Everyone is welcome!

No refunds will be provided after the performance time and date specified on the tickets.

If you are unable to attend your showtime, you can swap the tickets for a different show time at the box office, or refund the tickets online. To request a refund, please fill out your information here. In person ticket swaps and online refunds can only be done up to 1 hour before the original showtime.

Please note: For every ticket that is purchased, RoadHouse Cinemas must pay the movie studios.

HAPPY HOUR

Monday-Friday 3:00-6:00 PM & Monday-Thursday 9:00-Close 1/2 off all beer, wine, RoadHouse margaritas!

$6.50 TUESDAYS

All Shows - All Day only $6.50!

WISE WEDNESDAYS

Seniors 55+ are $5.95 before 5:00 pm! ($6.47 after tax)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL

Seven days a week, all shows before 12:00 Noon are only $7.45! That's unbeatable!

Roadie Tees

RoadHouse "Roadie" Tees are the best deal going! Not only are they cool shirts, but they're part of our loyalty program! Wear it all the time, but if you also wear it to RoadHouse, you get FREE POPCORN each time you come to see a movie during the 2024 calendar year. Super comfortable, stylish shirts with your favorite theater branded on it!
